text:
Dominic Edward Cooper (born 2 June 1978) is an English actor. He is known for his roles in "Mamma Mia!" and its sequel "Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again".
He played Jesse Custer on the AMC show "Preacher" (2016–2019). He has also appeared as the young Howard Stark in the Marvel Cinematic Universe, including in ' (2011), a cameo in ' (2014), and the TV series "Agent Carter" (2015–16).

annotations.surface_form: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
